data.actual_result: The username gets truncated in such a way that the status of person isn't visible (i.e. the status also gets into the truncated part).
data.expected_result: The Username gets truncated in such a way that the status of the person is visible.
data.short_description: The username in the header of a DM with a person who has a long username gets truncated  in such a way that the status doesn't appear beside their name.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a DM with a person with a long username. - Observe the header.
